meanings.definition: a group of people or animals that are small in number and move together
meanings.sent1: The bheesties of birds flew in a V formation.
meanings.sent2: The bheesties of children ran happily in the park.
meanings.sent3: The bheesties of squirrels chattered noisily in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The bheesties of stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The bheesties of ants worked together to carry a leaf.

meanings.definition: to move quickly and in a group, often in a disorganized way
meanings.sent1: The students bheesties out of the classroom when the bell rang.
meanings.sent2: The sheep bheesties across the field to reach the fresh grass.
meanings.sent3: The ducks bheesties around the pond, quacking loudly.
meanings.sent4: The leaves bheesties down the street in the strong wind.
meanings.sent5: The clouds bheesties across the sky, blocking the sun intermittently.
